name: Weavile
flavorText:
They live in cold regions, forming
groups of four or five that hunt
prey with impressive coordination.

previous.name: Abomasnow
previous.flavorText:
It whips up blizzards in mountains
that are always buried in snow.
It is the abominable snowman.

next.name: Magnezone
next.flavorText:
It evolved from exposure to a
special magnetic field.
Three units generate magnetism.

pokemon.name: Sneasel
pokemon.flavorText:
Its paws conceal
sharp claws. If
attacked, it sud­ denly extends the
claws and startles
its enemy.

pokemon.name: Weavile
pokemon.flavorText:
They live in cold regions, forming
groups of four or five that hunt
prey with impressive coordination.

pokemon.name: Sneasler
pokemon.flavorText:
Because of Sneasler's virulent poison and daunting physical
prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen
highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.
